Keywords: Injustice League , Mystical , Secret Society of Super-Villains
Real Name: Felix Faust
Special Powers
A DEAL WORTHY OF MY NAMESAKE: When an opposing character within range would use Outwit, Probability Control, or Perplex, roll a d6. 1: That character can use that power an additional time this turn. 4-5: The use of that power has no effect. 6: The use of that power has no effect and, after resolutions, deal that character 1 penetrating damage.
TRAVELING THE LEY LINES: Stealth // FREE: Place Felix Faust in a square up to 4 squares away from his current square.
THE BELL, THE WHEEL, THE JAR OF THE DEMONS THREE: Outwit, Probability Control, Enhancement.

Comments
November 19, 2021
Redrover454
This guy is a superb companion piece for tentpole teams. Outwit and Prob to get your big attack off, enhancement to beef up your Tent pole or make your minions shoot a little harder, and his trait helps mitigate the fact that your opponent will likely have more utility powers than you. His 10/2 PB is great for cleanup after your big swings. The placement, stealth, and Mystics are just the cherries on top of what is easily one of my favorite figs in Modern rn. 5/5 stars.
October 14, 2021
Hellboy the Bellboy
Finally had a chance to play him and holy moly he's going on every Mystical team I play from now until the end of time.
April 26, 2021
muel0017
This guy at 30pts might be my new Mister Oz. Great powerset.
